required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Dose Requirements of Rocuronium Bromide (Zemuron®) in Pediatric and Adolescent Subjects (21048)(COMPLETED)(P05797)
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized, Phase IIIB, Multicenter Trial to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamic Parameters of Intubation Bolus, and Bolus and Infusion Maintenance Doses of Zemuron® in Pediatric and Adolescent Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the dose requirements of rocuronium bromide when administered as a bolus dose (a single, large dose) for intubation (insertion of a tube through the nose or mouth into the trachea to provide artificial ventilation) and when administered by either continuous infusion or bolus doses for maintenance of muscle relaxation in term neonates (birth to <28 days old), infants (28 days to <=3 months) and toddlers (>3 months to <=2 years), children (2 years to less than or equal to 11 years of age), and adolescents (>11 years to less than or equal to 17 years of age).

primary_outcome.description: Total dose from administration of intubating dose to reappearance of T3 (the third twitch of a Train of Four [TOF] stimulation) after the last maintenance bolus dose or discontinuation of Zemuron (rocuronium) infusion (Per protocol [PP] data set)

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 Ratio (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) 70%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: after surgery, from the reappearance of T3 after Zemuron(R) (rocuronium) infusion/last bolus dose of Zemuron(R) (rocuronium)
secondary_outcome.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 70%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) Ratio 80%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: after surgery, from the reappearance of T3 after Zemuron(R) (rocuronium) infusion/last bolus dose of Zemuron(R) (rocuronium)
secondary_outcome.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 80%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) Ratio 90%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: after surgery, from the reappearance of T3 after Zemuron(R) (rocuronium) infusion/last bolus dose of Zemuron(R) (rocuronium)
secondary_outcome.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 90%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).

intervention.description: Subjects received a bolus dose of rocuronium for intubation followed by bolus doses for maintenance of muscle relaxation
Subjects received a bolus dose of rocuronium for intubation followed by continuous infusion of rocuronium for maintenance of muscle relaxation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female subjects from birth up to 17 years of age who are scheduled for surgery with an anticipated duration of anesthesia of about 2 hours or more requiring a maintenance muscle relaxation dose(s).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects whose parent(s) or legal guardian(s) are not willing to give written consent and where applicable, subjects who have not given appropriate assent to participate in the trials will not be allowed to enter.

results_reference.citation: Bhattacharya ST, Jeffrey Koh J, Martin L, Suresh S, Frietsch T. Randomized, Multicenter Trial of Rocuronium in Neonates, Infants, Toddlers, Children & Adolescents [abstract]. Anesthesiology. 2009;111(5):A841.

measure.title: Total Dose of Zemuron (Rocuronium) Administered

outcome.title: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 Ratio (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) 70%
outcome.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 70%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).
outcome.time_frame: after surgery, from the reappearance of T3 after Zemuron(R) (rocuronium) infusion/last bolus dose of Zemuron(R) (rocuronium)

reported_events.desc: All subjects who received rocuronium were included in the safety analyses. Information regarding adverse events were obtained by questioning or examining the subject. At each visit during the treatment period, all new complaints and symptoms were recorded.

group.title: Rocuronium Bolus Maintenance
group.description: Subjects that received a bolus dose of rocuronium for intubation followed by bolus doses for maintenance of muscle relaxation (includes neonates, infants, toddlers, children, and adolescents).

group.title: Rocuronium Continuous Infusion Maintenance
group.description: Subjects that received a bolus dose of rocuronium for intubation followed by continuous infusion of rocuronium for maintenance of muscle relaxation (includes neonates, infants, toddlers, children, and adolescents)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any scientific paper, presentation, or other communication concerning the clinical trial described in the protocol will first be submitted to Organon, at least 6 weeks ahead of estimated publication or presentation, for written consent, which shall not be withheld unreasonably.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Senior Vice President, Global Clinical Development
